DOC.brief_summary: Primary Objective : To determine maximum tolerate dose docetaxel give Irinotecan Carboplatin treatment inoperable lung cancer . Secondary Objective : To evaluate dose-related toxicity triple regimen patient inoperable lung cancer .
DOC.brief_title: Docetaxel , Irinotecan , Carboplatin Extensive Stage Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: A phase I/II dose escalate study determine maximum tolerate dose docetaxel give Irinotecan Carboplatin treatment inoperable lung cancer .
DOC.criteria: 18 year older unresectable lung cancer measurable evaluable lesion Karnofsky PS great equal 60 % untreated CNS metastasis
